iast_content: oṃ vāk mad manas pratiṣṭhā manas mad vāc pratiṣṭhā āvirāv mā as
veda mad āṇi stha śru mad mā prahā
idam adhī ahorātra saṃdhā ṛta vad
satya vad
tad mad av
tad vaktṛ av
av mad av vaktṛ av vaktṛ
oṃ śānti śānti śānti
parisamāp karman saha apara brahman viṣaya vijñāna
tad etad karman jñāna sahita para gati uktha vijñāna dvāra upasaṃhṛ
etad satya brahman prāṇa ākhyā etad eka deva etad eva prāṇa sarva deva vibhūti etad prāṇa ātman bhāva gam devatā apī iti vac
tad idam devatā apyaya lakṣaṇa para puruṣa artha etad mokṣa
tad ca idam yathā vac jñāna karman samuccaya sādhana prāp na atas para as iti eka pratipad
tad nirācikīrṣu uttara kevala ātman jñāna vidhāna artha ātman vai idam iti ādya
katham punar akarman sambandhin kevala ātman vijñāna vidhāna artha uttara grantha iti gam
anya artha an avagama
tathā ca pūrva vac devatā agni ādi saṃsārin tva darśay aśanāyā ādi doṣavat tva tad aśanā pipāsā anvavarj ityādi
aśanāyā ādimat sarva saṃsāra eva para tu brahman aśanāya ādi atyaya śruti
bhū evam kevala ātman jñāna mokṣa sādhana na tu atra aka eva adhikṛ viśeṣa aśravaṇa
a karmin āśrama antara iha aśravaṇa
karman ca bṛhatī sahasra lakṣaṇa prastu anantaram eva ātman jñāna prārabh
tasmāt karmin eva adhikṛ
na ca karman a sambandhin ātman vijñāna pūrvavat anta upasaṃhāra

yathā karman sambandhin puruṣa sūrya ātman sthāvara jaṅgama ādi sarva prāṇin ātman tva vac brāhmaṇa mantra ca sūrya ātman ityādi tathā eva etad brahman etad indra ityādi upakram sarva prāṇin ātman tva yat ca sthāvara sarva tad prajñā netra iti upasaṃhṛ
tathā ca saṃhitā upaniṣad etad hi eva bahu vṛc mahat uktha mīmāṃs ityādi karman sambandhin tva vac sarva bhūta etad eva brahman iti ācakṣ iti upasaṃhṛ
tathā tad eva yad idam aśarīra prajñā ātman iti vac yad ca adas āditya eka eva tad iti vid iti ekatva vac
iha api ka idam ātman iti upakram prajñā ātman tva eva prajñāna brahman iti darśay
tasmāt na a karman sambandhin ātman jñāna
punar ukti ānarthakya iti ced

katham prāṇa vai mad as ṛṣi ityādi brāhmaṇa sūrya ātman iti mantra ca nirdhāray ātmma iti praśna pūrvaka punar nirdhāraṇa punar vac anarthaka iti ced na tad eva dharma antara viśeṣa nirdhāraṇa artha tva na punar ta tā doṣa
katham tad eva karman sambandhin jagant sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra ādi dharma viśeṣa nirdhāraṇa artha tva kevala upāsti artha tva vā
athavā ātman ityādi para grantha saṃdarbha ātman karmin karman anyatra upāsana aprāpti karman prastāva avihita tva kevala api ātman upās iti evam artha
bheda abheda upās tva vā eka eva ātman karman viṣaya bheda dṛṣṭi bhāj tad eva akarman kāla abheda api upās iti evam apunarukta tā
vidyā ca avidyā ca yad tad vid ubhaya saha
avidyā mṛtyu tṛ vidyā amṛta aś iti kṛ eva iha karman jijīviṣ śata samā iti ca vājin
na ca varṣa śata parama āyus martya
yad karman parityāga ātman upās
darśay ca tāvat puruṣa āyus ahar sahasra bhū iti
varṣa śata ca āyus karman eva vyāp
darśay ca mantra kṛ eva iha karman ityādi
tathā yāvajjīvam agnihotra hu yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsa yaj iti ādya ca
tad yajña pātra dah iti ca
ṛṇa traya śruti ca
tatra pārivrājya ādi śāstra vyutthā atha bhikṣā carya car iti ātman jñāna stuti para atha vā da
anadhikṛta artha vā
na parama artha vijñāna phala adarśana kriyā anupapatti
yad vac karmin ātman jñāna karman sambandhin ca ityādi tad na
para hi āp kāma sarva saṃsāra doṣa varjay brahman mad as iti ātman tva vijñāna kṛ kṛ vā prayojana ātman paś phala adarśana kriyā na upapad
phala adarśana api niyuj tva kṛ iti ced na niyoga aviṣaya ātman darśana
iṣ yoga aniṣṭa viyoga ca ātman prayojana dṛś tad upāya arthin yad bhū tad niyoga viṣaya dṛś loka
na tu tad viparīta niyoga aviṣaya brahman ātman tva darśin
brahman ātman tva darśin api as ced niyuj niyoga aviṣaya api as na kaścit na niyuj iti sarva karman sarva sarvadā kṛ prap
tad ca aniṣṭa
na ca tad niyuj śak kaścit āmnāya api tad prabhava tva
mad hi sva vijñāna uttha vacas svayam niyuj
na api bṛhu vidṛ svāmin a vivekin bhṛtya
āmnāya nitya tva as svātantrya sarva prati niyoktṛ tva sāmarthya iti ced ma vac doṣa
tathā api sarva sarvadā sarva aviśiṣṭa karman kṛ iti vac doṣa api a parihṛ eva
tad api śāstra eva vidhā iti ced yathā karman kartavyatā śāstra kṛ tathā tad api ātman jñāna tad eva karmin śāstra vidhā iti ced na virudh artha bodhaka tva anupapatti
na hi eka kṛ a kṛ sambandhin tva tad viparīta tva ca bodhay śakya śīta uṣṇa tā iva agni
na ca iṣ yoga cikīrṣā ātman aniṣṭa viyoga cikīrṣā ca śāstra kṛ sarva prāṇin tad darśana
śāstra kṛ ced tad ubhaya gopāla ādi na dṛś a śāstra jña tva tad
yad hi svatas aprāpta tad śāstra bodhay
tad ced kṛ kṛ tavyatā virodhin ātman jñāna śāstra kṛ katham tad virudh kṛ tavytā punar utpāday śīta tā iva agni tamas iva ca bhānu
na bodhay eva iti ced na tad mad ātman iti vid prajñāna brahman iti ca upasaṃhāra
tad ātman eva vid tattva as iti evamādi vākya tad para tva
utpad ca brahman ātman vijñāna abādhyamāna tva na an utpad bhram iti śakya vac
tyāga api prayojana abhāva tulya tva iti ced na akṛta iha kaścana iti smṛti yad ah vid brahman vyutthāna eva kṛ iti tad api etad samāna doṣa prayojana abhāva iti ced na akriyā mātra tva vyutthāna
avidyā nimitta hi prayojana bhāva na vastu dharma sarva prāṇin tad darśana
prayojana tṛṣṇā ca preray vāc manas kāya pravṛtti darśana
tad kāmay jāyā mad as ityādi putra vitta ādi pāṅkta lakṣaṇa kāmya eva iti ubh hi etad eṣaṇa eva iti vājasaneyibrāhmaṇa avadhāraṇa
avidyā kāma doṣa nimitta vāc manas kāya pravṛtti pāṅkta lakṣaṇa vid avidyā ādi doṣa abhāva anupapatti kriyā bhāva mātra vyutthāna na tu yāga ādi vat anuṣṭhā rūpa bhāva ātmaka
tad ca vidyā vat puruṣa dharma iti na prayojana anviṣ
na hi tamas pravṛt vad āloka yad garta paṅka kaṇṭaka ādya tapana tad kiṃprayojana iti praśna arha

vyutthāna tarhi artha prāp tva na codana arha iti gārhasthya ced para brahman vijñāna jan tatra eva a kṛ kkk āsana na tatas anyatra gamana iti ced na kāma prayuj tva gārhasthya etāvat vai kāma iti ubh hi etad eṣaṇā eva iti avadhāraṇa
kāma nimitta putra vitta ādi sambandha niyama abhāva mātra na hi tatas anyatra gamana vyutthāna vac
atas na gārhasthya eva kṛ āsana utpad vidyā
etad guru śuśrūṣā tapas api apratipatti vidvas sidh

atra kaścit gṛhastha bhikṣāṭana ādi bhaya paribhava ca tras sūkṣma dṛṣṭi tā darśay uttara ah bhikṣu api bhikṣāṭana dī niyama darśana deha dhāraṇa mātra arthin gṛhastha api sādhay sādhana eṣaṇa ubhaya vinirmuc deha mātra dhāraṇartha aśana ācchādana mātra upajīv gṛha evāstvāsana iti
na sva gṛha viśeṣa parigraha niyama kāma prayuj tva iti vac uttara etad
sva gṛha viśeṣa parigraha abhāva ca śarīra dhāraṇa mātra prayuj aśana ācchādana arthin sva parigraha viśeṣa abhāva atha bhikṣuka tva eva
śarīra dhāraṇa artha bhikṣāṭana ādi pravṛtti yathā niyama bhikṣu śauca ādi ca tathā gṛhin api vid akāmin as nityakarman niyama pravṛtti yāvat jīva ādi śruti niyuj tva pratyavāya parihāra iti
etad niyoga aviṣaya tva vid prativac aśakya niyojay tva ca iti
yāvat jīva ādi nitya codana ānarthakya iti ced
na a vid vat viṣaya tva arthavat tva
yad tu bhikṣu śarīra dhāraṇa mātra pravṛt pravṛtti niyam tva tad pravṛtti na prayojaka
ācamana pravṛt pipāsā apagama vat na anya prayojana artha tva avagam
na ca agnihotra ādi tadvat artha prāp pravṛtti niyam tva upapatti
artha prāp pravṛtti niyama api prayojana abhāva an upapad eva iti ced
na tad niyama pūrva pravṛtti sidh tva tad atikrama yatna gaurava
artha prāp vyutthāna punar vacana vidvas kṛ tva upapatti
a vid api mumukṣu pārivrājya kṛ eva
tathā ca śam dam ityādi vacana pramāṇa
śama dama ādi ca ātman darśana sādhana anya āśrama anupapatti
atyāśramin parama pavitra pravac samyak ṛṣi saṃgha juṣ iti ca śveta aśvatara vijñā
ana karman na prajā dhana tyāga eka amṛta tva aś iti ca kaivalya śruti
jñā naiṣkarmya ācar iti ca smṛti
brahman āśrama pada vas iti ca brahmacarya ādi vidyā sādhana ca sākalya ati āśramin upapatti grārhasthya asaṃbhava
na ca asaṃpanna sādhana kaścit artha sādhana alam
yad vijñāna upayogin ca gārhasthya āśrama karman tad parama phala upasaṃhṛ devatā apyaya lakṣaṇa saṃsāra viṣaya eva
yadi karmin eva paramātman vijñāna bhū saṃsāra viṣaya eva phala upasaṃhāra na upapad
aṅga phala tad iti ced na tad virodhin ātman vastu viṣaya tva ātman vidyā
nirākṛ sarva nāman rūpa karman parama artha ātman vastu viṣaya jñāna amṛta tva sādhana
guṇa phala sambandha hi nirākṛ sarva viśeṣa ātman vastu viṣaya tva jñāna na prāp
tad ca aniṣṭa yatra tu idam sarva ātman eva bhū
iti adhikṛ kriyā kāraka phala ādi sarva vyavahāra nirākāraṇa vid as
tad viparīta a vid yatra hi dvaita iva iti vac kriyā kāraka phala rūpa eva saṃsāra darśay tva ca vājasaneyibrāhmaṇa
tathā iha api devatā apyaya saṃsāra viṣaya yad phala aśanāya ādimat vastu ātmaka tad phala upasaṃhṛ kevala sarva ātmaka vastu viṣaya jñāna amṛta tva vac iti pravṛt
ṛṇa pratibandha a vid eva manuṣya pitṛ deva loka prāpti prati na vid
tad idam manuṣya loka putra eva ityādi loka traya sādhana niyama śruti
vid ca ṛṇa pratibandha abhāva darśay ātman loka arthin ka prajā kṛ ityādi
tathā etad va sma vai tad vid ah ṛṣ kāvaṣeya ityādi
etad ha sma vai tad pūrva vid agnihotra na hu iti ca kauṣītakin
a vid ra ṛṇa apākaraṇa pārivrājya an upapatti iti ced
na prāk gārhasthya pratipatti ṛṇin tva asaṃbhava

adhikāra a āruh api ṛṇin ca as sarva ṛṇin tva iti aniṣṭa prasañj apratipad gārhasthya api gṛha vanībhū pravraj yadi vā itarathā brahmacarya eva pravraj gṛha vā vana vai iti ātman darśana upāya sādhana tva iṣ eva pārivrājya
yāvat jīva ādi śruti a vidvadamumukṣu viṣaya kṛtārtha tā
chāndogya ca kaścit dvādaśan rātra agnihotra hu tatas ūrdhvam parityāga śru
yad tu an adhikṛta pārivrājya iti tad na tad pṛthak eva utsad agni anagnika vai iti ādi śravaṇa
sarva smṛti ca aviśeṣa āśrama vikalpa prasidh samuccaya ca
yad tu vidaathaa prāp vyutthāna iti a śāstra artha tva gṛha vana vā sthā na viśeṣa iti tad asat vyutthāna eva artha prāptvava na anyatra avasthāna as
anyatra avasthāna kāma karman prayuj tva hi vac tad abhāva mātra vyutthāna iti ca
yathākāmin tva tu vid atyantam aprāpta atyanta muh viṣaya tva avagama
tathā śāstra coday api karman ātman vid aprāpta guru bhāra tā avagam
ka uta atyanta a viveka nimitta yathākarmin tva
na hi unmāda timira dṛṣṭi upalabh vastu tad apagama api tathā eva as
unmāda timira dṛṣṭi nimitta tva eva tad
tasmāt ātman vid vyutthāna vyatireka na yathākāmin tva na ca anya kṛ iti etad sidh
yad tu vidyā ca avidyā ca yad yad vid ubhaya sahas iti na vidyāvat vidyā saha avidyā api vṛt iti idam artha ka tarhi eka puruṣa etad ekadā eva na saha sambandh iti artha
yathā śuktikā rajata śuktikā jñāna eka puruṣa
dūram etad viparīta viṣvañc avidyā yad ca vidyā iti jñā iti hi kāṭhaka
tad na vidyā as avidyā asaṃbhava as
tapas brahman vijijiñās ityādi śruti tapas ādi vidyā utpatti sādhana guru upāsana ādi ca karman avidyā ātmaka tva avidyā vac tad vidyā utpāday mṛtyu kāma atitṝ
tatas niṣkāma tyaj eṣaṇas brahman vidyā amṛta tva aś itya tad artha darśay ah avidyā mṛtyu tṛ vidyā amṛta aś iti
yad tu puruṣa āyus sarva karman eva vyāp av na iva iha karman jijīviṣ śata sama iti tad avidvat viṣaya tva parihṛ itaratha asaṃbhava
yad tu vac api pūrva vac tulya tva karman aviruddha ātman jñāna iti tad sa viśeṣa nirviśeṣa ātman tā prativac uttaratra vyākhyāna ca darśay
atas kevala niṣkriya brahman ātmaka tva vidyā darśana artha uttara grantha ārabh

ātman āpn i atti atati vā para sarvajña sarva śakti aśanāyādi sarva saṃsāra dharma varjay nitya śuddha budh a muc svabhāva aja ajara amara umṛ abhaya advaya vai idam yad vac nāman rūpa karman bheda bhid ñjagant ātman eva eka agra jagant sṛṣṭi prak as
ka na idānīm tad eva eka na
katham tarhi as iti vac yadi api idānīm tad eva eka tathā api as viśeṣa
prāñc utpatti a vyākṛ nāman rūpa bheda ātman bhū ātman eka śabda pratyaya gocara jagant idānīm vyākṛ nāman rūpa bheda tva aneka śabda pratyaya gocara ātman eka śabda pratyaya gocara ca iti viśeṣa

yathā salila pṛthak phena nāman rūpa vyākaraṇa prāk salila eka śabda pratyaya gocara eva phena yadā salila pṛthak nāman rūpa bheda vyākṛ bhū tadā salila phena ca iti aneka śabda pratyaya bhāj salila eva iti ca eka śabda pratyaya bhāj ca phena bhū tadvat
na anya kaścana na kaścit api miṣ nimiṣ vyāpāra vat itara vā
yathā sāṃkhya an ātman pakṣapā svatantra pradhāna yathā ca kāṇāda aṇu na tadvat iha anya ātman kaścit api vastu vid ka tarhi ātman eva eka as iti abhiprāya
tad sarvajña svābhāvya ātman eka eva as īkṣ
nanu prāk utpatti akārya karaṇa tva katham īkṣ
na idam doṣa sarvajña svābhāvya tathā ca mantra varṇa a pāṇi pāda javana grahītṛ ityādi
ka abhiprāya iti ah loka ambhas prabhṛti prāṇin karman phala upabhoga sthāna bhū nu sṛj sṛj mad iti
evam īkṣ ālocay
tad ātman idam loka sṛj sṛj
yathā iha buddhimat takṣa ādi evam prakāra prāsāda ādi sṛj iti īkṣ ṣṣṣka antara prāsāda ādi sṛj tadvat
nanu sa upādāna takṣa ādi prāsāda ādi sṛj iti yuj nirupādāna tu ātman katham loka sṛj
na etad doṣa salila phena sthānīya ātman bhū nāman rūpa avyākṛta ātman eka śabda vac vyākṛ phena sthā
jagant upādāna bhū sambhū
tasmāt ātman bhūta nāman rupa upādāna bhū as sarva jña jagant nirmā iti aviruddha
athavā yathā vijñānavat māyāvin nirupādāna ātman eva ātman antara tva ākāśa gam iva nirmā tathā sarvajña deva sarva śakti mahāmāyā ātman eva ātman antara tva jagant rūpa nirmā iti yuktatara
evam ca as kārya kāraṇa ubhaya asat vādya ādi pakṣa ca na prasañj su nirākṛ ca bhū
ka loka sṛj iti ah ambhas marīci mara ap iti
ākāśa ādi krama aṇḍa utpāday ambhas prabhṛti loka sṛj
tatra ambhas prabhṛti svayam eva vyācakṣ śruti
adas tad ambhas śabda vac loka para div div loka para parastāt tad ambhas śabda vac ambhas bharaṇa
div pratiṣṭhā āśraya tad ambhas loka
div loka adhastāt antarikṣa yad tad marīci
eka api aneka sthāna bheda tva bahuvacana bhāj marīci iti marīci vā raśmi sambandha
pṛthivī mara mṛ idam bhūta iti
yad adhastāt pṛthivī tad ap vac āpnoti loka
yadi api pañcan bhūta ātmaka tva loka tathā api ap bāhulya ap nāman eva ambhas marīci mara ap iti vac
sarva prāṇin karman phala upādāna adhiṣṭhāna bhū catur loka sṛj
tad īśvara punar eva īkṣ
idam nu ambhas prabhṛti mad sṛj loka paripālayitṛ varjay vinaś tasmāt idam rakṣaṇa artha lokapāla loka pālayitṛ sṛj sṛj mad iti
evam īkṣ tad adap evam ap pradhāna eva pañcabhūta yad ambhas prabhṛti sṛj ad eva eva iti artha
puruṣa puruṣa ākāra śiras pāṇi ādimat samuddhṛ ap samupādā mṛd piṇḍa iva kulāla pṛthivī mūrchay mūrchay saṃpiṇḍay sva avayava saṃyojana iti artha
tad piṇḍa puruṣavidha uddiś abhitap
tad abhidhyāna saṃkalpa kṛ iti artha yad jñāna maya tapas iti ādi śruti
tad abhitap īśvara saṃkalpa tapas abhitap piṇḍa mukha nirbhid mukha ākāra suṣira jan yathā pakṣin aṇḍa nirbhid evam
tad nirbhid ā mukha vāc karaṇa indriya nirvṛt tad adhiṣṭhātṛ agni tatas vāc lokapāla
tathā nāsikā nirbhid
nāsikā prāṇa prāṇa dvāyu iti sarvatra adhiṣṭhāna karaṇa devatā ca traya krameṇa nirbhid iti
akṣi karṇa tvac hṛdaya antaḥkaraṇa adhiṣṭhāna manas antaḥkaraṇa nābhi sarva prāṇa bandhana sthāna
apāna saṃyuj tva apāna iti pāyu indriya vac
tasmāt tad adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā mṛtyu
yathā anyatra tathā śiśna nirbhid prajanana indriya sthāna
indriya retas retas visarga artha tva saha retas vac
retas ap iti

tad etad agni ādi devatā lokapāla tva saṃkalpay sṛj īśvara idam saṃsāra rṇava saṃsāra samudra mahat avidyā kāma karman prabhava duḥkha udaka tīvra roga jarā mṛtyu mahat grāha an ādi ananta apāra nirālamba viṣaya indriya janay sukhaa vakṣaṇa viśrāma pañc an indriya artha tṛṇmāruta vikṣobha utthāanartha śata mahat ūrmi mahāraurava ādi aneka niraya gam hāhā ityādi kūj a ākrośana udbhū mahat rava atya ārjava dāna dayā hiṃsā śama dama dhṛti ādi ātman guṇa pātheya pūrṇa jñāna uḍupa sat saṅga sarva tyāga mārga mokṣa tīra etad mahat arṇava prapat pat tatavat
tasagnani ādi devatā apyaya lakṣaṇa api yad gati vyākhyā jñāna karman samuccaya anuṣṭhāna phala bhū tad api na alam saṃsāra duḥkha upaśama iti idam vivakṣi atha atra
yatas evam tad eva vid para brahman ātman ātman sarva bhūta ca yad vac viśeṣaṇa prakṛ ca jagant utpatti sthiti saṃhāra hetu tva tad sarva saṃsāra duḥkha upaśamana vid
tasmāt etad pathin etad ka etad brahman etad satya yad etad para brahman ātman jñāna na anya pathin vid ayana iti mantra varṇa
tad sthāna karaṇa devatā utpatti bīja bhū puruṣa prathama utpāday piṇḍa ātman aśanāyā pipāsā anvavarj anugamay saṃyojay iti athi
tad kāraṇa bhū aśanan ādi doṣavat tva tad kārya bhū api devatā aśanāya ādimat tva
tad tatas aśanāyā pipāsā pīḍay enad pitāmaha sraṣṭṛ brū vac āyatana adhiṣṭhāna mad mad prajñā vidhā
yad āyatana pratiṣṭhā samartha as anna ad bhakṣay iti
evam vac īśvara
tad devatā go gava ākṛti viśiṣ piṇḍa tad eva ap pūrvavat piṇḍa samuddhṛ mūrchay nī darśay
tad punar ga a ākṛti dṛś brū na vai mad mad artha adhiṣṭhāna anna ad idam piṇḍa alam na vai
alam paryāp ad na yogya iti artha
go pratyākhyā tad aśva ānī tad brū na vai mad idam alam iti pūrvavat
sarva pratyākhyāna
tad puruṣa ānī sva yoni bhū
tad sva yoni puruṣa dṛś akhinna as sukṛta śobhana kṛ idam adhiṣṭhāna bata iti brū tasmāt puruṣa vāva puruṣa eva sukṛta sarva puṇya karman hetu tva
svayam vā sva iva ātman sva māyā kṛ tva sukṛta iti vac
tad devatā īśvara brū i yamidam idam adhiṣṭhāna iti man sarva hi sva yoni ram atas yathāyatanam yad yad vadana ādi kriyā yogya āyatana tad praviś iti
tathā as iti anujñā pratilabh īśvara nagarī iva bala adhikṛ ādi
agni vāc abhimānin vāc eva bhū sva yoni mukha praviś tathā vac artha anya
vāyu nāsikā āditya akṣi diś karṇa oṣadhi vanasyati tvac candramas hṛdaya mṛtyu na abhi ap śiśna praviś
evam labh adhiṣṭhāna devatā
niradhiṣṭhāna sat aśanāyā pipāsā tad īśvara brū vac
mad adhiṣṭhāna abhiprajñā cintay vidhā iti artha
tad īśvara evam vac tad aśanāyā pipāsā brū
na hi tvad bhāva rūpa tva cetanāvat vastu an āśri a nārtṛ tva sambhū
tasmāt etad eva agni ādya tvad tvad devatā adhyātma adhidevatā ābhaj vṛtti saṃvibhāga anugrah
etad bhāginī yad devatya yad bhāga havis ādi lakṣaṇa as tad tad eva bhāga bhāgin bhāgavata tvad kṛ iti
sṛṣṭi ādi īśvara evam vidhā yasmāt tasmāt idānīm api yad ka ca devatā artha havis grah caru puroḍāśa ādi lakṣaṇa bhāgin eva bhāgavata eva idam devatā aśanāya pipāsā bhū
evam hi loka īśvara anugraha nigraha ca svātantrya dṛś sva
tadvat maheśvara api sarva īśvara tva sarva prati nigraha anugraha api svātantrya eva
tad īś ara anna sisṛkṣu tad eva pūrva vac ap uddiś abhitap
tad abhitap upādāna bhū mūrti ghana rūpa dhāraṇa samartha carācara lakṣaṇa jan a utpad
anna vai tad mūrti rūpa yad vai tad mūrti jan
tad enad anna loka lokapāla artha abhimukha sṛj tad yathā mūṣaka ādi mārjāra ādi gocara as mad mṛtyu anna āda iti man parāgañc iti para añc sa dattṛ atī ājighāṃs atigam iṣ iṣ palāy prārabh iti artha
tad anna abhiprāya man tad loka lokapāla saṃghāta kārya karaṇa lakṣaṇa piṇḍa prathama ja tva anya ca anna āda paś tad anna vāc vadana vyāpāra jighṛkṣay grah iṣ
tad anna na śak na samartha bha vāc vadana kriyā grah upādā
tad prathama ja śarīrin yad yadi ha enad vāc grah grahhaas anna sarva api loka tad kārya bhū tva abhivyāhṛ ha eva anna tṛp tṛp bhū na ca etad as atas na śak vāc grah ti avagam pūrvaja api
samāna uttara
tad prāṇa tad cakṣus tad śrotra tad tvac tad manas tad śiśna tad tad karaṇa vyāpāra anna grah a śak paścāt apāna vāyu mukha chidra tad anna ghṛkṣay
tad ā vayā tad anna evam grah āśay
tad tad etad apāna vāyu anna graha anna grāhaka iti etad
yad vāyu yad vāyu an āyus anna bandhana anna jīvana vai prasidh tad etad yad vāyu

tad evam loka lokapāla saṃghāta sthiti ana nimitta kṛ pura paura tad pālayita sthiti sama svāmin iva īkṣ katham nu ka prakāra iti vitarkay idam mad ṛte mad antareṇa puras vāmin yad idam kārya karaṇa saṃghātaka vac katham nu khalu mad antara as para artha sat
yadi vāc abhivyāhṛ ityādi kevala eva vāc vyavaharaṇa ādi tad nirarthaka na kathaṃcana bhū bali stuti ādi vat paura vandya ādi prayuj svāmin artha as tad svāmin antareṇa asat eva svāmin tadvat
tad mad para svāmin adhiṣṭhātṛ kṛ a kṛ phala sākṣin bhū bhujtṛ bhū pura iva rājan
yadi nāma etad saṃhan kārya para artha tva para arthin mad cetana antareṇa bhū pura paura kārya iva tad svāmin atha ka mad kiṃsvarūpa ka vā svāmin
yadi mad kārya karaṇa saṃghāta anupraviś vāc a ādi abhivyāhṛ ādi phala na upalabh rājan iva pura āviś adhikṛ puruṣa kṛ ākṛ a avekṣaṇa na kaścit madmayam as evaṃrūpa ca iti adhigam vicāray

viparyaya tu yad idam vāc a ādi abhivyāhṛ ādi idam iti vid tad vedana rūpa ca iti adhigam mad as yad artha idam saṃhan vāgādi abhivyāhṛ ādi yathā stambha kuḍya ādi prāsāda ādi saṃhan sva avayava asaṃhatpara artha tva tadvat iti
evam īkṣ atas katara prapad iti
prapad ca mūrdhan ca idam saṃghāta praveśa mārga
idam katara mārga idam kārya karaṇa saṃghāta lakṣaṇa pura prapad prapad iti
evam īkṣ na tāvat mad bhṛtya prāṇa mad sarva artha adhikṛ praveśa mārga prapada adhas prapad
ka tarhi pāriśeṣya idam mūrdhan vidāray prapad iti loka iva īkṣita kārin
tad iṣ īśvara etad eva mūrdhan sīman keśa vibhāga avasāna vidāray chidrīkṛ etad dvār mārga idam loka kārya karaṇa saṃghāta prapad praviś
tad idam hi prasidh dvi mūrdhan taila ādi dhāraṇa kāla anta tad rasa ādi saṃvedana
tad etad vidṛti vidāray tva vidṛti nāma prasidh dvi
itara tu śrotra ādi dvāra bhṛtya ādi sthānīya sādhāraṇa mārga tva na samṛddhi na ānanda hetu
idam tu dvāra parameśvara eva kevala iti tad etad nāndana nandana eva
nāndana iti daidhya chāndasa nand idam dvāra gam para brahman iti i
tad evam sṛj praviś jīva ātman rājan iva pura tri āvasatha
jāgaray kāsa indriya sthāna dakṣiṇa cakṣus svapna kāla antar manas suṣupti kāla hṛdaya ākāśa iti etad
vac vā tri āvas pitṛ śarīra mātṛ garbhāśaya sva ca śarīra iti
tri svapna jāgrant svapna suṣupti ākhyā
nanu jāgarita prabodha rūpa tva na svapna na evam svapna eva
katham parama artha sva ātman prabodha abhāva svapna vat asat vastu darśana ca
idam eva āvasatha cakṣus dakṣiṇa prathama manas antara dvitīya hṛdaya ākāśa tṛtīya
idam āvasatha iti vac anukīrtana eva
tad hi idam āvasatha paryāya ātman bhāva vṛt avidyā dīrgha kāla gāḍha prasvap svābhāvika na prabudh aneka śata sahasra anartha saṃnipāta ja duḥkha mudgara abhighāta anubhava api
tad jan śarīra praviś jīva ātman bhūta abhivīaikh vyākṛ

tad kadācid parama kāruṇika ācārya ātman jñāna prabodha kṛt śabdaka vedānta mahat vākya bherī tad karṇa mūla tāḍay etad eva sṛṣṭi ādi kartṛ tva prakṛ puruṣa pur śī ātman brahman bṛhattatama takāra eka lup tatatama vyāptatama paripṛ ākāśa vat pratibudh paś
katham idam brahman mad ātman
sva rūpa dṛś dṛś as aho iti vicāraṇa artha pluti pūrvam
yasmāt idam iti eva yad sākṣāt aparokṣa brahman sarva antara paś parokṣa
tasmāt idam dṛś iti idandra nāma parama ātman
idandra ha vai nāma prasidh loka īśvara
tad evam idandra as indra iti parokṣa parokṣa abhidhāna ācakṣ brahman vid saṃvyavahāra artha
pūjyatama tva pratyakṣa nāman grahaṇa bhaya
tathā hi parokṣa apriya parokṣa nāman grahaṇa priya iva eva hi yad deva ka uta sarva deva api deva maheśvara
dvi vacana prakṛ adhyāya parisamāpti artha

idam caturtha adhyāya etad vākya artha jagant utpatti sthiti pralaya kṛt asaṃsārin sarvajña sarva śakti sarva vid sarva idam jagant sva anya vastu antara anupāda eva ākāśa ādi krama sṛj sva ātman prabodhana artha sarva ca prāṇa ādimat śarīra svayam praviś
praviś ca sva ātman yathā amṛta idam brahman as iti sākṣāt pratibudh
tasmāt tad eva sarva śarīra eka eva ātman na anya iti
anya api sama ātman brahman as iti evam vid iti
ātman vai idam eka eva agra as iti brahman tatama iti ca vac
anyatra ca
sarva gam sarva ātman bāla agra mātra api a praviś na as iti katham sīman vidāray prapad pipīlikā iva suṣira
nanu ati alpa idam coday bahu ca atra coday
a karaṇa as īkṣ
an upādā kaścit loka sṛj
ap puruṣa samuddhṛ mūrchay

tad bhabhānn mukha ādi nirbhid mukha ādi ca ani ādi lokapāla tad ca aśanāyā pipāsā ādi saṃyojana tad āyatana prārthana tad artha gavādi pradarśana tad yathāyatana praveśana sṛj anna palāyana vāgādi tad jighṛkṣā etad sarva sīmā vidāraṇa praveśa sama eva
as tarhi sarva eva idam an upapad
na atra ātman avabodha mātra vivakṣita tva sarva idam artha vāda iti adoṣa
māyā vivat vā mahat māyāvin deva sarvajña sarva śakti sarva etad kṛ
sukha avabodhana pratipatti artha loka vat ākhyāyikā ādi prapañca iti yuktatara pakṣa
na hi sṛṣṭi ākhyāyikā ādi parijñāna kaścit phala iṣ
aikātmya sva rūpa parijñāna tu amṛta tva phala sarva upaniṣad prasidh
smṛti ca gīta ādya sama sarva bhūta sthā parameśvara ityādi
nanu tri ātman
bhoktṛ kartṛ saṃsārin jīva eka sarva loka śāstra prasidh

aneka prāṇin karman phala upabhoga yogya aneka adhiṣṭhāna vat loka deha nirmāṇa liṅga yathā śāstra pradarśay pura prāsāda ādi nirmāṇa liṅga tad viṣaya kauśala jñānavat tad kartṛ takṣa ādi iva īśvara sarvajña jagant kartṛ dvitīya cetana ātman avagam
yatas vāc nivṛt na iti na iti iti ādi śāstra prasidh aupaniṣada puruṣa tṛtīya evam etad tri ātman an anyonya vilakṣaṇa tatra katham eka eva ātman advitīya asaṃsārin iti jñā śak
tatra jīva eva tāvat katham jñā
nanu evam jñā śrotṛ mantṛ draṣṭṛ ādeṣṭṛ ghoṣṭṛ vijñātṛ prajñā iti
nanu vipratiṣidh jñā yad śravaṇa ādi kartṛ tva āmanas mantṛ a vijñā vijñā iti ca
tathā na mati mantṛ man na vijñā vijñātṛ vijñā ityādi ca
satya vipratiṣidh yadi pratyakṣa jñā sukha ādi vat
pratyakṣa jñāna ca nivāray na mati mantṛ man ityādi
jñā tu śravaṇa ādi liṅga tatra kutas vipratiṣedha
nanu śravaṇa ādi liṅga api katham jñā yāvat yadā śru ātman śru śabda tadā tad śravaṇa kriyā eva vṛt tva manana vijñāna kriyā na sambhū ātman paratra vā
tathā anyatra api manana ādi kriyā
śravaṇa ādi kriyā ca sva viṣaya eva
na hi man anyatra mantu manana kriyā sambhū
nanu manas sarva eva man
satya evam tathā api sarva api man mantṛ antareṇa na man śakya
yadi evam ka as
idam atra as sarva yad idam mantṛ tad mantṛ eva iti na tad man as
na ca dvitīya mantu mantṛ as
yadā tad ātman eva man tadā yad ca man ātman ātman yad ca man ātman tad dvi prasañj
eka eva ātman dvidhā mantṛ man tva dvi śakalībhū vaṃśa ādi vat ubhayathā api anupapatti eva
yathā pradīpa prakāśay prakāśaka tva anupapatti sama tva tadvat
na ca mantu man manana vyāpāra śūnya kāla as ātman manana
yadā api liṅga ātman man mantṛ tadā api pūrvavat eva liṅga man ātman yad ca tad mantṛ tad dvi prasañj
eka eva vā dvidhā iti pūrva vac doṣa
na pratyakṣa na api anumāna jñā ced katham vac tad mad ātman iti vid iti katham vā śrotṛ mantṛ ityādi
nanu śrotṛ tva ādi dharmavat ātman aśrotṛ tva ādi ca prasidh ātman
ka atra viṣama dṛś
yadi api tvad na viṣama tathā api mad tu viṣama pratibhā
katham yadā adas śru tadā na mantṛ yadā mantṛ tadā na śru
tatra evam as pakṣa śrotṛ mantṛ pakṣa na śrotṛ na api mantṛ
tathā anyatra api ca
yadā evam tadā śrotṛ tva ādi dharmavat ātman aśrotṛ tva ādi dharmavat vi saṃśaya sthāna katham tvad na vaiṣamya
yadā devadatta gam tadā na sthā gam eva
yadā sthā tadā na gantṛ sthā eva
tadā idam pakṣa eva gantṛ tva sthātṛ tva ca
na nitya gantṛ tva sthātṛ tva vā
tadvat
tathā eva atra kāṇāda ādi dṛś
pakṣa prāp eva śrotṛ tva ādi ātman vac śrotṛ mantṛ ityādi vacana
saṃyoga ja tva a yaugapadya ca jñāna hi ācakṣ
darśay ca anyatra anas
bhū a dṛś ityādi yugapad jñāna anupatti manas liṅga iti ca nyāyya
bhū evam ka tvad naś yadi evam as as evam tvad iṣṭa ced
śruti artha tu na sambhū
ka na śrotṛ mantṛ iti ādi śruti atha na na śrotṛ na mantṛ ityādi vacana
nanu pākṣika tva prativac tvad
na nityam eva śrotṛ tva ādi abhyupagama
na hi śrotṛ śruti viparilopa vid iti ādi śruti
evam tarhi nityam eva śrotṛ tva ādi abhyupagama pratyakṣa virudh yugapad jñāna utpatti ajñāna abhāva va ca ātman kalpay as
tad ca aniṣṭa iti
na ubhaya doṣa upapatti
ātman śruti ādi śrotṛ tva ādi dharmavat tva śruti
anitya mūrch ca cakṣus ādi dṛṣṭi ādi anitya eva saṃyoga viyoga dharmin yathā agni jvalana tṛṇa ādi saṃyoga ja tva tadvat
na tu nitya amūrta asaṃyoga viyoga dharmin saṃyoga ja dṛṣṭi ādi a nitya dharmavat tva sambhū
tathā ca śruti na hi draṣṭṛ dṛṣṭi viparilopa vid iti ādya
evam tarhi dvi dṛṣṭi cakṣus anitya ṛṣṭi nitya ca ātman
tathā ca dvi śruti śrotra anitya nitya ca ātman svarūpa
tathā dvi mati vijñāti bāhyā bāhya evam hi eva
tathā ca idam śruti upapad bhū dṛṣṭi draṣṭṛ śruti śru iti ādya
loka api prasidh cakṣus timira ga a apāya naś dṛṣṭi jan dṛṣṭi iti cakṣus dṛṣṭi anitya tva tathā ca śrutimatī ādi ātman dṛṣṭi ādi ca nitya tva prasidh eva loka
vad hi uddhṛ cakṣus svapna adya maya bhrātṛ dṛś iti
tathā avagam bādhirya svapna śru mantra adya ityādi
yadi cakṣus saṃyoga ja eva ātman nitya dṛṣṭi tad nāśa naś
tadā uddhṛ cakṣus svapna nīla pīta ādi na paś
na hi draṣṭṛ dṛṣṭi iti ādya ca śruti an upapad as
tad cakṣus puruṣa yad svapna dṛś iti ādya ca śruti
nitya ātman dṛṣṭi bāhya anitya dṛṣṭi grāhika
bāhya dṛṣṭi ca upajana apāya ādya anitya dharmavat tva tad grāhika ātman dṛṣṭi tadvat avabhāsa tva anitya tva ādi bhrānti nimitta loka iti yuj
yathā bhramaṇa ādi dharma vat alāta ādi vastu viṣaya dṛṣṭi api bhram iva tadvat
tathā ca śruti dhyā iva lelāy iva iti
tasmāt ātman dṛṣṭi nitya tva na yaugapadya a yaugapadya vā as
bāhya anitya dṛṣṭi upādhi vaśa tu loka tārkika ca āgama sampradāya varjay tva anitya ātman dṛṣṭi iti bhrānti upapad eva
jīva īśvara parama ātman bheda kalpanā ca etad nimitta eva

tathā ca as na as iti ādya ca yāvat vāc manas bheda yatra bha bhū tad viṣaya nitya dṛṣṭi nirviśeṣa as na as eka nānā guṇavat aguṇa jñā na jñā kriyāvat akriya phalavat aphala sa bīja nirbīja sukha duḥkha madhyama madhya śūnya a śūnya para mad anya iti vā sa rava vāc pratyaya agocara svarūpa yad vikalpay iṣ tad nūnam kha ati carman vat veṣṭay iṣ sopāna iva ca pad āruh jala kha ca mīna vayas ca pada didṛkṣ
na iti na iti yatas vāc nivṛt ityādi śruti
ka addhā veda iti ādi mantra varṇa
katham tarhi tad tad mad ātman iti vedanā
brū ka prakāra tad mad tad mad ātman iti vidyā
atra ākhyāyikā ācakṣ kaścit kila manuṣya muh kaścit vac kaścit aparādha as dhik tvad na as manuṣya iti
tad muh tā ātman manuṣya tva pratyāyay kaścit upe ah brū bhavat ka mad as iti
tad tad muh tā jñā ah
krameṇa bodhay iti
sthāvara ādi ātman bhāva apoh na tvad amanuṣya iti vac uparam
tad tad muh pratyah bhavat mad bodhay pravṛt tūṣṇīm bhū
ka na bodhay iti tādṛś eva tad bhū vacana
na as a manuṣya iti vac api manuṣya tva ātman na pratipad yad tad katham manuṣya as iti vac api manuṣya tva ātman pratipad tad yathyathāśāstra upadeśa eva ātman avabodha vidhi na anya
na hi agni dāhay tṛṇa ādi anya kaścit dhṛ śakya
atas eva śāstra ātman svarūpa bodhay pravṛt a amanuṣya tva pratiṣedha iva na iti na iti
iti vac uparam
tathā anta rama bāhya idam ātman brahman sarva anubhū iti anuśāsana
tattva as yatra tu idam sarva ātman eva bhū tad ka ka paś iti evamādi api ca

yāvat idam evam yathā vac idam ātman na vid tāvat idam bāhya anitya dṛṣṭi lakṣaṇa upādhi ātman tva upe avidyā upādhi dharma ātman man brahman ādi stamba paryanta deva tiryañc nara sthāna punar punar āvṛt avidyā kāma karman vaśa saṃsṛ
tad evam punar evam eva nadī srotas vat janman maraṇa prabandha aviccheda vṛt ka avasthā vṛ vṛt iti etad artha darśay ah śruti vairāgya hetu
idam eva avidyā kāma karman abhimānavat yajña ādi karman kṛ idam loka dhūma ādi krama anna bhū puruṣa agni hu
tad puruṣa ha vai idam saṃsārin rasa ādi krama āditas prathamatas retas rūpa garbha bhū iti etad ah yat etad puruṣa retas tad rūpa iti
tad ca etad retas anna maya piṇḍa sarva aṅga avayava rasa ādi lakṣaṇa tejas sāra rūpa śarīra sambhū pariniṣpad tad puruṣa ātman bhū tva ātman
tad ātman retas rūpa garbhībhū ātman eva sva śarīra eva ātman bhṛ dhāray
tad retas yadā yad kāla bhāryā ṛtumat tad yoṣā agni strī sic gam atha tadā enad etad retas ātman garbha bhū janay pitṛ
tad idam puruṣa sthāna nirgamana retas seka kāla retas rūra idam saṃsārin prathama janman prathama avasthā abhivyakti
tad etad vac purastāt adas ātman adas ātman ityādi
tad retas yad strī sic as tad ātman bhūya ātman avyatireka tā yathā pitṛ evam gam prāp yathā sva aṅga stana ādi tathā tadvat eva
tad hetu enad mātṛ tad garbha na hiṃs piṭaka ādi vat
yasmāt stana ādi sva aṅga vat ātman bhū gam tasmāt na hiṃs na bādh iti artha
tad antarvatnī etad idam bhartṛ ātman atra ātman udara gam praviś budh bhāvay vardhay paripālay garbha virudh aśana ādi parihāra anukūla aśana ādi upayoga ca kṛ
tad bhāvayitṛ vardhayitṛ bhartṛ ātman garbha bhū bhāvay vardhay rakṣay ca bhartṛ bhū
na hi upakāra pratyupakāra antareṇa loka kaścit kaścit tamamban upapad
tad garbha strī yathā vac garbha dhāraṇa vidhāna bhṛ dhāray agra prāñc janman
tad pitṛ agra eva pūrvam eva jan mātra janman adhi ūrdhvam janman jan kumāra jātakarman ādi pitṛ bhāvay
tad pitṛ yad yasmāt kumāra janman adhi ūrdhvam agra jan mātra eva jātakarman ādi yad bhāvay
tad ātman eva bhāvay
pitṛ ātman eva hi putra rūpa jan
tathā hi vac pati jāyā praviś ityādi
tad kimartha ātman putra rūpa janay bhāvay iti vac idam loka saṃtati aviccheda iti artha
vicchid ihamam loka putra utpādana ādi yadi na kṛ kaścana
evam putra utpādana ādi karman aviccheda eva saṃtata prabandha rūpa vṛt hi yas āt idam loka tasmāt tad aviccheda tad kṛ na mokṣa iti artha
tad idam saṃsārin kumāra rūpa mātṛ udara ā yad nirgamana tad retas rūpa apekṣā dvitīya janman dvitīya avasthā abhivyakti
idam pitṛ tad idam putra ātman puṇya śāstra vac karman karman niṣpādana artha pratidhā pitṛ sthāna pitṛ yad kṛ tad karaṇa pratinidhā iti artha
tathā ca sampratti vidyā vājasaneyaka pitṛ anuśās mad brahman mad yajña ityādi pratipad iti
atha anantaram putra niveśay ātman bhāra idam putra itara idam yad pitṛ ātman kṛtakṛtya kṛ ṛṇa traya vimuc kṛ kṛ iti artha vayas ga gam vā jṛ as pre mṛ
tad itas idam pre eva śarīra parityaj eva tṛṇa jalūkā vat deha antara upādā karman ci punar jan
tad idam mṛ pratipad yad tad tad tṛtīya janma
nanu saṃsṛ pitṛ sakāśa retas rūpa prathama janman
tad iva kumāra rūpa mātṛ dvitīya janman vac
tad eva tṛtīya janman vac pre pitṛ yad janman tad tṛtīya iti katham vac
na etad doṣa pitāputra aikātmya vivakṣ tva
tad api putra sva putra bhāra nidhā itas pre eva punar jan yathā pitṛ
tad anyatra vac itaratra api vac eva bhū iti man śruti pitāputra eka ātman tva

evam saṃsṛ avasthā abhivyakti traya janman maraṇa prabandha āruh sarva loka saṃsāra a sudra nipat kataścit yadā śruti vac ātman vijñā yad kaścit avasthā tadā eva muc sarva saṃsāra bandhana kṛtakṛtya bhū iti
etad vastu tad ṛṣi mantra api vac iti ah
garbha nu mātṛ garbha āśaya eva as
nu iti vitarka

aneka janman antara bhāvanā paripāka vaśa idam deva vāc agni ādi janiman janman viśva viśva sarva anvave mad aho anubudh as iti artha śata aneka bahu mā mad pur āyasa āyasya loha maya iva abhedya śarīra iti abhiprāya rakṣ arakṣitavat saṃsāra pāśa nirgamana adhas
atha śyena iva jāla bhid javas ātman jñāna kṛ sāmarthya niradīya nirgam as
aho garbha eva śī vāmadeva ṛṣi evam vac etad

tad vāmadeva ṛṣi yathā vac ātman evam vid idam śarīra bheda śarīra avidyā parikalpay āyasa vat a nirvidya janana manaṇa ādi aneka anartha śata āviś śarīra prabandhana paramātman jña ana amṛta upayoga janay vīrya kbheda śarīra utpatti bīja avidyā ādi nimitta upamarda hetu śarīra vināśa iti artha

ūrdhva paramātman bhū as adhobhāva saṃsāra utkram jñāna avadyotay amala sarva ātman bhāva āpad s adas yathā vac ajara amara amṛta abhaya sarvajña apūrva an apara anantara abāhya prajñāna amṛta eka rasa pradīpa vat nirvāṇa atigam svarga loka sva ātman sva svarūpa amṛta sambhū
ātman jñāna pūrvam āp kāma tā jīv eva sarva kāma āp iti artha
dvis vacana sa phala sa udāhaṇa ātman jñāna pari samāpti pradarśana artha

bahman vidyā sādhana kṛ sarva ātman bhāva phala avāpti vāmadeva ādi a ācārya paramparā śrut avadyotay brahman vid pariṣad atyanta prasidh upalabh mumukṣu brāhmaṇa adhunātana brahman jijñāsu anitya sādhya sādhana lakṣaṇa saṃsāra ājīva bhāva vyāvivṛtsu vicāray nyonya pracch ka idam ātman iti katham
yad ātman idam ātman iti sākṣāt vada upās ka tad ātman iti yad ca ātman idam ātman iti sākṣāt upās vāmadeva amṛta sambhū tad eva vayana api upās ka nu khalu tad ātman iti
evam jijñāsā pūrva anyonya pracch atikram viśeṣa viṣaya śruti saṃskāra janay smṛti jan
eta prapada prapad brahman idam puruṣa as etad eva sīman vidāray etad dvār prapad etad eva puruṣa
atra dvi brahman itaretara prātikūlya pratipad iti
tad ca āsya piṇḍa ātman bhū
tad anyatara ātman upās bhū arh
yad atra upās ka ātman iti viśeṣa nirdhāraṇa artha punar anyonya pracch vicāray
punar tad vicāray viśeṣa vicāraṇa āspada viṣaya mati bhū
katham dvi vastu idam piṇḍa upalabh
aneka bheda bhid karaṇa yad upalabh
yad ca eka upalabh
karaṇa antara upalabh viṣaya smṛti pratisaṃdhāna
tatra na tāvat yad upalabh tad ātman bhū arh
ka punar upalabh iti vac yad vā cakṣus bhūta rūpa dṛś
yad vā śru śrotra bhū śabda yad vā ghrāṇa bhū gandha āghrā yad vā vāc karaṇa bhū vāc nāma ātmaka vyākṛ go aśva iti evamādya sādhu asādhu iti ca yad vā jihvā bhū svādu ca asvādu ca vijñā iti
ka punar tad eva eka anekadhā bhid karaṇa iti vac
yad vac purastāt prajā retas hṛdaya hṛdaya retas manas manas sṛj ap ca varuṇa ca hṛdaya manas manas candramas
tad eva etad hṛdaya manas ca eka eva tad anekadhā
etad antaḥkaraṇa eka cakṣus bhūta rūpa dṛś śrotra bhū śru ghrāṇa bhū ghrā vāc bhūta vad jihvā bhū rasay sva eva vikalpanā rūpa manas vikalpay hṛdaya rūpa adhyavaso
tasmāt sarva karaṇa viṣaya vyāpāraka eka idam karaṇa sarva upalabdhi artha upalabdhṛ
tathā ca kauṣītakī prajñā vāc samāruh vāc sarva nāman āp
prajñā cakṣus samāruh cakṣus sarva rūpa āp ityādi
vājasaneyaka ca manas hi eva dṛś manas śru hṛdaya hi rūpa jñā ityādi
tad hṛdaya manas vac sarva upalabdhi kara tva prasidh
tad ātmaka ca prāṇa yad vai prāṇa tad prajñā yad vai prajñā tad prāṇa iti hi brāhmaṇa
karaṇa saṃhati rūpa ca prāṇa iti vac prāṇa saṃvāda ādi
tasmāt yad pad prapad tad brahman tad upalabdhṛ upalabdhi karaṇa tva guṇa bhū tva na eva tad vastu brahman upās ātman bhū arh
pāriśeṣya yad upalabdhṛ upalabdhi artha etad hṛdaya manas rūpa karaṇa vṛtti vac
tad upalabh upās ātman mad bhū arh iti niścaya kṛ
tad antaḥkaraṇa upādhi stha upalabdhṛ prajñā rūpa brahman upalabdhi artha yad antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti bāhya antarvartin viṣaya viṣaya tad idam vac

saṃjñāna saṃjñapti cetana bhāva ājñāna ājñapti īśvara bhāva vijñāna kalā ādi parijñāna prajñāna prajñapti prajña tā medhā grantha dhāraṇa sāmarthya dṛṣṭi indriya dvār sarva viṣaya upalabdhi dhṛti dhāraṇa avasad śarīra indriya yad uttambhana bhū dhṛti śarīra udvah iti hi vad mati manana manīṣā tatra svātantrya jūti cetas ruj ā ādi duḥkhin tva bhāva smṛti smaraṇa saṃkalpa śukla kṛṣṇa ādi bhāva saṃkalpana rūpa ādi kratu adhyavasāya asu prāṇana ādi jīvana kriyā nimitta vṛtti kāma asaṃnihita viṣaya ākāṅkṣa a tṛṣṇā vaśa strī vyatikara ādi abhilāṣa iti evamādya antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti prajñapti mātra upalabdhṛ upalabdhi artha tva śudh dha prajñāna rūpa brahman upādhi bhū tad upādhi janay guṇa nāmadheya bhū saṃjñāna ādi
sarva eva etad prajñāna nāmadheya bhū na svatas sākṣāt
tathā ca vac prāṇ eva prāṇa nāma bhū ityādi
tad etad prajñāna rūpa ātman brahman apara sarva śarīra stha prāṇa prajñā ātman
antaḥkaraṇa upādhi anupraviś jala bheda gam sūrya pratibimba vat hiraṇya garbha prāṇa prajñā ātman etad eva indra guṇa devarāja vai etad prajāpati yad prathama ja śarīrin
yatas mukha ādi nirbheda dvāra agni ādi lokapāla jan tad prajāpati etad eva
yad api etad agni ādi sarva deva etad eva

idam ca sarva śarīra upādāna bhū pañcan pṛthivī ādi mahat bhūta anna a na āda tva lakṣaṇa etad kiṃca idam ca kṣudra miśra kṣudra alpaka miśra iva śabda anarthaka sarpa ādi bīja kāraṇa itara ca itara ca dvairāśya nirdiś
ka tad vac aṇḍa ja pakṣin a ādi jāruja jarāyu ja manuṣya ādi sveda ja ādi yūka ādi udbhi ja ca vṛkṣa ādi aśva go puruṣa hastin anya ca yad kiṃca idam prāṇin jāta ka tad jaṅgama yad cal pad gam
yad ca patatrin ākāśa patana śīla
yad ca sthāvara acala
sarva tad etad eva
sarva tad aśeṣatas prajñā netra
prajñapti prajñā tad ca brahman eva
nī dam iti netra prajñā netra yad tad idam prajñā netra
prajñāna brahman utpatti sthiti laya kāla pratiṣṭhā prajñā āśraya iti artha
prajñā netra loka pūrvavat
prajñā cakṣus vā sarva eva loka prajñā pratiṣṭhā sarva jagant
tad prajñāna brahman
tad etad pratyas ita sarva upādhi viśeṣa as nirañjana nirmala niṣkriya śam eka adaa na iti na iti iti sarva viśeṣa apoha saṃvid sarva śabda pratyaya agocara
tad api anta viśudh prajñā upādhi sambandha sarvajña īśvara sarva sādhāraṇa avyākṛta jagant bīja pravartaka niyantṛ tva antaryāmin saṃjñā bhū
tad eva vyākṛ jagant bīja bhūta buddhi ātman abhimāna lakṣaṇa hiraṇya garbha saṃjñā bhū
tad eva anta raṇḍa udbhū prathama śarīra upādhimat virāj prajāpati saṃjñā bhū
tad bhūta agni ādi upādhimat devatā saṃjñā bhū
tathā viśeṣa śarīra upādhi api brahman ādi stamba paryanta tad tad nāman rūpa lābha brahman
tad eva eka sarva upādhi bheda bhid sarva prāṇin tārkika ca sarva prakāra jñā vikalpay ca anekadhā
etad eka vad agni manu an prajāpati
indra eka apara prāṇa apara brahman śāśvata ityādya smṛti
tad vāmadeva anya vā evam yathā vac brahman vid prajñā ātman yad eva prajñā ātman pūrva vid amṛta bhū tathā idam api vid etad eva prajñā ātman idam loka utkram ityādi vyākhyā
idam loka utkram adas svarga loka sarva kāma āp amṛta sambhū sambhū iti oṃ iti
